channel.title: Tooling on Bridge The Gap
channel.description: Recent content in Tooling on Bridge The Gap

item.title: How to Be a Productive Dev
item.description: For this post I’m going to explore some of the ways that have helped me and may help you become more a productive dev. I’m not going to talk about practices such as Agile, Scrum or DevOps because those are focussed on teams. In this post I want to focus on the individual developer and how they can improve their own productivity. The Developer Let’s start with the obvious, but often overlooked (and most important) area, the developer.
